EOG Resources (EOG) Price Target Raised to $127 at Wells Fargo

EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) is one of the largest crude oil and natural gas exploration and production companies in the United States, with proven reserves in the US and Trinidad.

On January 27, Wells Fargo slightly raised its price target on EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) from $126 to $127, while keeping an ‘Overweight’ rating on the shares. The analyst noted that the macro oil environment is currently under pressure from the
